--- select_singer_with_tablesample.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers AS A TABLESAMPLE RESERVOIR (100 ROWS),
  Singers AS B TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (0.1 PERCENT),
  Singers AS C TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (0.1 PERCENT)

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  With:  (*ast.With)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   11,
      Source: &ast.Join{
        Op:     ",",
        Method: "",
        Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
        Left:   &ast.Join{
          Op:     ",",
          Method: "",
          Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
          Left:   &ast.TableName{
            Table: &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 18,
              NameEnd: 25,
              Name:    "Singers",
            },
            Hint: (*ast.Hint)(nil),
            As:   &ast.AsAlias{
              As:    26,
              Alias: &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 29,
                NameEnd: 30,
                Name:    "A",
              },
            },
            Sample: &ast.TableSample{
              TableSample: 31,
              Method:      "RESERVOIR",
              Size:        &ast.TableSampleSize{
                Lparen: 53,
                Rparen: 62,
                Value:  &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 54,
                  ValueEnd: 57,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "100",
                },
                Unit: "ROWS",
              },
            },
          },
          Right: &ast.TableName{
            Table: &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 67,
              NameEnd: 74,
              Name:    "Singers",
            },
            Hint: (*ast.Hint)(nil),
            As:   &ast.AsAlias{
              As:    75,
              Alias: &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 78,
                NameEnd: 79,
                Name:    "B",
              },
            },
            Sample: &ast.TableSample{
              TableSample: 80,
              Method:      "BERNOULLI",
              Size:        &ast.TableSampleSize{
                Lparen: 102,
                Rparen: 114,
                Value:  &ast.FloatLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 103,
                  ValueEnd: 106,
                  Value:    "0.1",
                },
                Unit: "PERCENT",
              },
            },
          },
          Cond: nil,
        },
        Right: &ast.TableName{
          Table: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 119,
            NameEnd: 126,
            Name:    "Singers",
          },
          Hint: (*ast.Hint)(nil),
          As:   &ast.AsAlias{
            As:    127,
            Alias: &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 130,
              NameEnd: 131,
              Name:    "C",
            },
          },
          Sample: &ast.TableSample{
            TableSample: 132,
            Method:      "BERNOULLI",
            Size:        &ast.TableSampleSize{
              Lparen: 154,
              Rparen: 166,
              Value:  &ast.FloatLiteral{
                ValuePos: 155,
                ValueEnd: 158,
                Value:    "0.1",
              },
              Unit: "PERCENT",
            },
          },
        },
        Cond: nil,
      },
    },
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers AS A TABLESAMPLE RESERVOIR (100 ROWS), Singers AS B TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (0.1 PERCENT), Singers AS C TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (0.1 PERCENT)
